pkgmetadata.longdescription: Approximate Algorithm for Horseshoe Prior // Provides an approximate algorithm for the horseshoe estimator used in Bayesian linear models. By implementing a sampler with high computational cost in the 'Rcpp' package and using an approximate algorithm that reduces matrix calculation complexity, parameter estimation speed for high-dimensional sparse data is faster. The approximate algorithm is described in Johndrow et al. (2020) https://www.jmlr.org/papers/v21/19-536.html.
